judges: Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgments are affirmed on the opinion for the Superior Court: see 168 Pa. Superior Ct. 22.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Hayden C. Covington, with him Harold Mayberry, for appellants.
Ralph H. Griesemer, City Solicitor, with him Joseph B. Walker, Assistant City Solicitor, Kenneth H. Koch, District Attorney and Ray R. Brennan, Assistant District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Geuss, Appellant.
Argued May 22, 1951.
Before Drew, C. J., Stern, Stearns, Jones, Bell, Ladner and Chidsey, JJ.
June 27, 1951:
Hayden C. Covington, with him Harold Mayberry, for appellants.
Ralph H. Griesemer, City Solicitor, with him Joseph B. Walker, Assistant City Solicitor, Kenneth H. Koch, District Attorney and Ray R. Brennan, Assistant District Attorney, for appellee.
